name: Ekans
description:
In this game, we've flipped the script on the classic Snake game. Instead of controlling the snake, you're the fruit! Your goal is to evade the relentless snake in a thrilling game of cat and mouse.


The real challenge lies not just in surviving, but in outdoing yourself and others. Collect points to climb the leaderboard and prove your skill. Every game is a new opportunity to reach the top!


This isn't just a game of chance. It's a test of your skill and tactical prowess. Points increase each time the snake devours an apple, so you'll need to think on your feet and make every move count.
